Package remodel.meta

Class Rule

java.lang.Object
remodel.meta.Nominal
remodel.meta.Property
remodel.meta.Operation
remodel.meta.Rule
Direct Known Subclasses:
FunctionRule, MappingRule, MergingRule, UpdatingRule
public abstract class Rule
extends Operation
Rule is is a kind of Operation representing an executable transformation rule. A Rule may have formal parameters, a list of Variables, and has an executable CompoundExpression body. Unlike other kinds of Property, a Rule is owned by a Transform (not by a Concept).
Version:
1.0
Author:
Anthony J H Simons

  • Constructor Details

    • Rule

      public Rule​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type)
      Creates a Rule with the given name and result type.
      Parameters:
      name - the name for this Rule.
      type - the result type for this Rule.

  • Method Details

    • isCached

      public boolean isCached()
      Reports whether this Rule is idempotent and caches its result.
      Returns:
      true by default; false in subclass FunctionRule.

    • getKind

      public java.lang.String getKind()
      Returns the ReMoDeL keyword String describing the this Rule-kind. This rule is of one of the kinds: "mapping", "updating", "merging", or "function".
      Overrides:
      getKind in class Property
      Returns:
      the ReMoDeL keyword for this kind of Rule.

    • getTransform

      public Transform getTransform()
      Returns the Transform owning this Rule.
      Returns:
      the owning Transform.

    • setTransform

      public void setTransform​(Transform owner)
      Sets the Transform owner of this rule. Invoked reciprocally when this Rule is added to a Transform.
      Parameters:
      owner - the owning Transform.

    • getSource

      public Variable getSource​(int index)
      Returns a source Variable of this Rule at the given index. Returns the Variable at the given index in the argument list.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the Variable.
      Returns:
      the indexing source Variable.

    • getTarget

      public Variable getTarget()
      Returns the target Variable of this Rule. Creates a Variable called "result" having the same result-type as this Rule.
      Returns:
      the target Variable.

    • findConcept

      public Concept findConcept​(java.lang.String type) throws SemanticError
      Looks up a Concept by its type name in the current context. Delegates to the Transform owning this Rule.
      Overrides:
      findConcept in class Property
      Parameters:
      type - the type name of the Concept.
      Returns:
      the Concept.
      Throws:
      SemanticError - if no Concept can be found.

    • findProperty

      public Property findProperty​(java.lang.String name)
      Looks up a Property by its name in the current context. Searches the list of Variable formal parameters, and if a match is found, returns that Variable. Otherwise, continues to search for a Rule with the given name in the Transform owning this Rule.
      Overrides:
      findProperty in class Operation
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Property.
      Returns:
      the Property.
      Throws:
      SemanticError - if no Variable can be found.
